Polerne er i :

$$
p_1 = -2 \quad p_2 = -3
$$

Dermed:

$$
H(s)= K \frac{1}{(s-p_1)(s-p_2)} = K \frac{1}{(s+2)(s+3)} = 3
$$

$$
\left.K \frac{1}{(s+2)(s+3)} = 3 \right|_{s=0}
$$
$$
K \frac{1}{5} = 3
$$
$$
K = 15
$$
Derfor: 
$$
H(s)= \frac{15}{(s+2)(s+3)}= \frac{15}{s^2+5s+6}
$$


```{r, echo = FALSE}
expr <- function(s) (15)/(s^2+5*s+6)
x_zero <- c()
y_zero <- c()
x_pole <- c(-2,-3)
y_pole <- c(0,0)
pole_zero_plot(x_zero, y_zero, x_pole, y_pole,4,expr,4)

```
